Bu oyun Half Life Source oyununun online versiyonudur. Ufak tefek buglar dƒ±≈üƒ±nda KUSURSUZ diyebilirim. Ve hala 10-15 ki≈üi bu oyunu oynuyor.

You get it as a bonus in the bundles that include Half Life, and I'd say it's worth a download if you got a friend. There are a lot of pros who know how to abuse the mines and it becomes really annoying but if you got a friend and you're playing either 1v1 or against strangers it is a lot of fun. The damage can get annoying, sometimes it feels like you're doing no damage, and other times you get oneshot from nowhere. But there's basically no respawn time so it doesn't matter that much (unless you're playing only with strangers as i said, then it just gets boring). Usually you can join a server with maybe 1-3 players and more people eventually join. And if you, once again, got a friend, you can join a server with 0 people and have it grow. So yeah there's still people playing it. It's good ol deathmatch from the 90's, why would you not give it a go?
This, Is A Game Of Miracles
Half-Life Deathmatch: Source is a recreation of the first multiplayer game set in the Half-Life universe. Features all the classic weapons and most-played maps, now running on the Source engine.

Comensemos con que es HL

Un modo bueno, un poco intuitivo, con una gran variedad de armas. 
Si eres fan de Valve supongo estaras familiarisado con ellas, ademas de que este juego tiene muchas mecanicas chulas como el bhop lo cual en lo personal me facina y bueno la oportunidad de ser todo un dios en un server.

Graficos: para la epoca buenos, en la actualidad pasables
Jugabilidad: Pro la verdad solo nesecitas acostumbrarte y jugar unos 30 minutos
Peso/precio: el precio talvez esperaria a las ofertas y peso es considerable por el contenido que tiene
Resumen 9/10

That... is a 7/10.

Now, as you can probably imagine this game is completely dead by now. But I will never stop loving the old Half-Life aesthetic, nor the SFX.

Plus if you and your friends are fans of the series, could be a fun little gaming sesh. Or if you're like me, sit in a server on your own long enough until somebody takes pity and joins you. I'll never forget you busud <3
It's what it says on the tin.

Advantages:
* Comes bundled with... something idk (HL1? The Orange Box?)
* [b]Gives you Half-Life: Source NPCs and weapons (not maps tho) for Garry's Mod, so you don't have to buy that dumpster fire of a "remaster"[/b]
Disadvantages:
* It sucks
* If you really like HL1 Deathmatch you can play it in the original
* The ragdolls (Deathmatch Source's only feature) does not work
* Nobody plays this and nobody should play this

Simply, don¬¥t buy this crap. Luckily I got it buying Half Life, but buying this separately it¬¥s wasting your money. The graphics are basically from Half Life Source, but that¬¥s not the biggest problem. Problem comes when you notice this game is dead as hell. If you want to search for a server, there will be only one with another five dudes. The other servers have no players neither bots. Oh, and plus: there is no option to add bots, so if you want to play wandering alone around the map this game is for you. If you want to play better games, save money from buying this shit.

Where's Players? Servers is zero offline

This game is great. It's the multiplayer portion of Half-Life ported to the Source engine, but unfortunately, hardly anyone plays it anymore. Anyway, this version has a lot of bugs and issues, but none of them are as annoying as the entity duplication bug. This bug affects almost all included maps, and it makes the game pretty much unplayable. However, there are some community-made maps that aren't affected by the bug. Overall, this game is fun to play with friends or bots, regardless of all the bugs and issues.

This game is great. It's the multiplayer portion of Half-Life ported to the Source engine. It's just a direct port though; no updated textures or models. Anyway, This version has a lot of bugs and issues, but none of them are as annoying as the entity duplication bug. This bug affects almost all included maps, and it makes the game pretty much unplayable. However, there are some community-made maps that aren't affected by the bug. Overall, this game is fun to play with friends or bots, regardless of all the bugs and issues.
